text: How can I control the keyboard and mouse with Python?
How can I control the mouse and keyboard in Python?
The idea is to do the same as the Robot() class in Java.
Be able to say: move the mouse from here to here, click there, write that whatever is on the screen.
For Windows there is win32api but I'm using mainly Linux.
For Linux there is Xlib but does it works for keyboard as well?
(Linux, Windows and even OS X would be the great.
